properties.name: security.internal-secret
properties.description: The secret key used for internal service-to-service authentication. This secret must be passed in the X-Internal-Secret header for requests to internal endpoints.

properties.name: security.internal-path-prefix
properties.description: The URI path prefix that identifies internal endpoints. Requests to paths starting with this prefix will require the internal secret header.

properties.name: security.excluded-paths
properties.description: List of URI path patterns to exclude from security processing. Requests matching these patterns will bypass the security filter entirely. Useful for health checks, actuator endpoints, etc.
